curam.util.rules
Class ItemListGroup

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.rules.ItemGroup
      curam.util.rules.ItemListGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class ItemListGroup
extends ItemGroup

ItemListGroup is a super class of all the list RDOs. It may contain several ItemListGroupDtls. It acts as a container for data related to list group entries.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

clearData

protected void clearData()
Reset the Item List Group. Used internally by the RDO pool factory.

Overrides:
clearData in class ItemGroup

insertIfRequired

public boolean insertIfRequired(int index)
                         throws AppException
Insert a new entry into List RDO at the next available position if the entry at specified position does not exist.

Parameters:
index - index of the entry to be inserted
Returns:
true if a new entry has been added, false otherwise
Throws:
AppException - ID_LISTGROUP_POSITION - if setting of current position fails

insertNewMember

public ItemListGroupDtls insertNewMember()
Insert a new entry into this List RDO and set current position to the new entry. Consider using ItemListGroup.insertIfRequired(int) instead.

Returns:
A new ItemListGroupDtls.

setLoopSize

public void setLoopSize(int newLoopSize)
Specify number of entries in this List RDO.

Parameters:
newLoopSize - new loop size
See Also:
ItemListGroup.getLoopSize(RulesParameters)

startLoader

public void startLoader()
The method saves the current position in the List RDO. This method should be called at the beginning of a loader that is loading data for this List RDO.

See Also:
ItemListGroup.endLoader()

endLoader

public void endLoader()
               throws AppException
The method restores the Rules Engine position to the List RDO entry that was saved by the ItemListGroup.startLoader(). This method should be called at the end of a loader that is loading data for this List RDO.

Throws:
AppException - ID_LISTGROUP_POSITION - if resetting of position fails
See Also:
ItemListGroup.startLoader()

setCurrentPos

public void setCurrentPos(int position)
                   throws AppException
Set the current position in the list group.

Parameters:
position - new position
Throws:
AppException - ID_LISTGROUP_POSITION - if setting of current position fails
See Also:
ItemListGroup.getCurrentPos(), ItemListGroup.setCurrentPos(RulesParameters, String)

public void setCurrentPos(RulesParameters rulesParameters,
                          java.lang.String position)
                   throws AppException,
                          InformationalException
Set the current position in the list group using the value of description item.

Parameters:
rulesParameters - dynamic rules execution data
position - new position
Throws:
AppException - ID_LISTGROUP_POSITION - if setting of current position fails

getLoopSize

public int getLoopSize(RulesParameters rulesParameters)
                throws AppException,
                       InformationalException
Get number of items in the list group and load the list group if it is not loaded yet.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Indicates whether two item list group records are equal. Two item list group records are equal if their item groups are equal and their current groups details are equal

Overrides:
equals in class ItemGroup
Parameters:
obj - The item list group record to compare to this instance
Returns:
true if the list group records are equal, false otherwise
